parameters.content:
## Job Application Automation System v1

**How to use:**
1. Add job to Google Sheet with status 'NEW'
2. Click 'Execute Workflow' to run
3. Check status column for results

**Config:**
- Edit the 'CONFIG' code node to change settings
- DRY_RUN_MODE / GLOBAL_PAUSE / personal details

nodes.name: CONFIG
nodes.notes:
EDIT THIS NODE to change settings.
Open the code and modify the CONFIG object.

nodes.name: Check Global Pause
nodes.notes:
Stops if GLOBAL_PAUSE is true.
Returns empty to halt workflow.

nodes.name: Read All Jobs from Sheet
nodes.notes: Reads all jobs from the Jobs sheet.

nodes.name: Filter NEW & Check Duplicates
nodes.notes:
Filters only NEW jobs.
Checks for duplicates against APPLIED entries.

nodes.name: Route Duplicates
nodes.notes:
Routes duplicates to status update.
Non-duplicates continue to job fetch.

nodes.name: Fetch & Extract Keywords
nodes.notes:
Fetches job URL, extracts text, finds keywords.
Falls back to manual description if fetch fails.

nodes.name: Generate Cover Letter
nodes.notes:
Generates customized cover letter.
Also determines final status (DRY-RUN or MANUAL REQUIRED).

nodes.name: Update Sheet - Status
nodes.notes: Updates job status in the Jobs sheet.

nodes.name: Send Notification
nodes.notes:
Sends email notification.
Requires Gmail OAuth2 credential.

nodes.name: Update Duplicate Status
nodes.notes: Marks duplicate jobs as SKIPPED in sheet.
